page.title: 06HOUSING-A BUSY COMMUNITY
page.content: In this area there can be found grass ,flowers ,fields ,old and new houses ,factories and even a reservior We talked to a farmer ,we talked to a librarian in a large housing scheme to find out all about the many bus services .There are shops of all kinds and huge stores .We found lots of primary schools but only one secondary school ,lots of flats where lots of people live .There are plents of hot food shops and there is usually a post office to be found where there is a row of shops .There are detached and semi-detached houses with green doors and windows and red doors and windows There is one small hospital and soon there will be a new Health Centre . Soon all the grassland will be built on to supply houses for people who want to live outside the city .
